name: ABC APP CREATOR
author: ABCApp Creator

sections.description:
ABC APP CREATOR – Free App

Connect easily your ABCApp with your WordPress!

WordPress feature allows you to integrate the content of a WordPress blog in an application.

Create your own App for IOS, Android and HTML5 Web App smartphones for free!

ABC Easy App It only takes three steps to create your unique app and to submit it to the common app stores.

Cross Platform Create once and obtain native apps for iPhone, iPads, Android phones and tablets and also a web app.

Create as many apps as you want without any limitations.

All features and modules are ready for you to use!

Sign up free

Features

Modules:

  • WordPress
  • Calendar
  • Booking
  • Folder
  • Job
  • Padlock
  • MCommerce
  • Discount
  • Set Meal
  • Admob
  • QR Coupons
  • Loyalty Card
  • Catalog
  • Audio
  • Video
  • Gallery
  • Radio
  • Fanwall
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Newswall
  • Places
  • Weather
  • Map
  • RSS Feed
  • Contact
  • Form
  • Push Notifications
  • Topics
  • Custom Page
  • Links
sections.installation:
1. Install directly ABCApp Creator through the plugin installer or upload the “abcapp-creator” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin by using the link provided by the plugin installer or through the “Plugins” menu in your WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install directly ABCApp Creator through the plugin installer or upload the “abcapp-creator” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin by using the link provided by the plugin installer or through the “Plugins” menu in your WordPress.
